00025     extern void* operator new(size_t size) throw();
00026     extern void operator delete(void* p) throw();
00027 #elif ! defined(APOXI_RTOS_WIN32)

00030 #else
00031     inline void* operator new(size_t size) { return Os::Alloc(size); }
00032     inline void operator delete(void* p) { Os::Free(p); }

00053 inline void* operator new(size_t, void* p) { return p; }
00054 
00057 inline void operator delete(void*, void*) { }

00062 template <class T> class Allocator {
00063     public:
00064         typedef Allocator<T> ThisType;
00065 
00070         static T* Alloc() { 
00071             return((T* ) Os::Alloc(sizeof(T))); 
00072             }
00073 
00079         static T* Alloc(INT n) { 
00080             return((T* ) Os::Alloc(n*  sizeof(T))); 
00081             }
00082 
00086         static void Free(T* p) { 
00087             Os::Free(p); 
00088             }
00089 
00093         static void Construct(T* p, const T& val) { 
00094             new (p) T(val); 
00095             } 
00096 
00100         static void Destruct(T* p) { 
00101             p->~T(); 
00102             }
00103 };
